column1: Little Goat Diner////My two friends and I split three dishes. The crab dip was so rich and creamy and loaded with crab
column2: and even though you may find yourself short of Ritz crackers
column3: don't hesitate to ask the waiter for more. The Asian tasty thing was my favorite dish
column4: and it's pretty much an Asian style pancake with bacon and dippy sauces. And the tempura mashed potatoes omg. I was really curious about that one since I've never seen anything like it before at a restaurant. Really
column5: it tastes exactly how you would expect it to taste. The first bite is wonderfully light and crispy
column6: and then in the smooth mashed potatoes inside just ooze out.
